00045 bool GameApp::Initialize()
00046 {
00047         // initialize PhysX
00048         m_pPhysXManager = NiPhysXManager::GetPhysXManager();
00049         if (!m_pPhysXManager->Initialize())
00050         return false;
00051     SetPhysXSDKParams();
00052 
00053         return NiApplication::Initialize();
00054 }

00062 bool GameApp::CreateScene()
00063 {
00064         // Because our scene will have some billboards with alpha, we use 
00065     // a NiAlphaAccumulator in order that our alpha gets sorted and drawn
00066     // correctly.5
00067     NiAlphaAccumulator* pkAccum = NiNew NiAlphaAccumulator;
00068     m_spRenderer->SetSorter(pkAccum);
00069         m_spRenderer->SetBackgroundColor(NiColor(0.0, 0.0, 1.0));
00070 
00071     NiStream kStream;
00072 
00073     // Load in the scenegraph for our world...
00074     bool bSuccess = kStream.Load(
00075         NiApplication::ConvertMediaFilename("models/scene2.nif"));
00076     
00077     if (!bSuccess)
00078     {
00079         NiMessageBox("scene.nif file could not be loaded!", "NIF Error");
00080         return false;
00081     }
00082 
00083     m_spScene = (NiNode*) kStream.GetObjectAt(0);
00084     NIASSERT(NiIsKindOf(NiNode, m_spScene));
00085         
00086         SetMaxFrameRate(120.0f);
00087 
00088         HidePointer();
00089 
00090         // create the main PhysX scene
00091         if (!CreatePhysXScene())
00092         {
00093                 return false;
00094         }
00095 
00096         // Update the scene graph before rendering begins.
00097     m_spScene->UpdateProperties();
00098     m_spScene->UpdateEffects();
00099     m_spScene->Update(0.0f);
00100     
00101     // Get simulation started. We give a small timestep to avoid zero length
00102     // steps, which cause problems with PhysX hardware in v2.3.2
00103     m_spPhysXScene->UpdateSources(0.001f);
00104     m_spPhysXScene->Simulate(0.001f);
00105     m_fLastSimTime = 0.001f;
00106 
00107         // load resources
00108         bSuccess = ResourceManager::Get()->Init(&kStream, m_spRenderer);
00109         if (!bSuccess) return false;
00110 
00111         // init game manager
00112         bSuccess = GameManager::Get()->Init(m_spScene, m_spPhysXScene, this);
00113         if (!bSuccess) return false;
00114 
00115         // init text manager
00116         bSuccess = TextManager::Get()->Init(m_spRenderer);
00117         if (!bSuccess) return false;
00118 
00119         // We expect the queen to have been exported with a camera, so
00120         // we look for it here.
00121         m_spCamera = FindFirstCamera(GameManager::Get()->GetQueen()->GetNode());
00122     if (!m_spCamera)
00123     {
00124         NiMessageBox("The NIF file has no camera!", "Camera Error");
00125         return false;
00126     }
00127 
00128         // create a new CameraController for our camera
00129         m_spCameraController = NiNew CameraController(m_spCamera);
00130 
00131         
00132     return bSuccess;
00133 }

00144         {
00145                 InputManager::Get()->ProcessInput(GetInputSystem(), this);
00146         }
00147         
00148 }
00149 //--------------------------------------------------------------------- 
00154 void GameApp::UpdateFrame()
00155 {
00156         // fetch previous frame's simulation results
00157         m_spPhysXScene->FetchResults(m_fLastSimTime, true);
00158     m_spPhysXScene->UpdateDestinations(m_fLastSimTime);
00159 
00160          // Calls process input
00161     NiApplication::UpdateFrame();
00162 
00163         // Update all of our GameObj3ds
00164         GameManager::Get()->UpdateAll(m_fAccumTime);
00165         
00166         m_spScene->Update(m_fAccumTime);
00167         m_spScene->UpdateProperties();
00168         m_spScene->UpdateEffects();
00169 
00170         // Update the current listener position (for sound - FMOD)
00171         NxActor* queenActor = GameManager::Get()->GetQueen()->GetAgent()->GetActor();
00172         NxVec3 nxPos = queenActor->getGlobalPosition()/50.0f;
00173         NxVec3 nxVel = queenActor->getLinearVelocity() / 50.0f;
00174         NxVec3 nxFor = queenActor->getGlobalOrientation().getColumn(0);
00175         
00176         SoundManager::Get()->Update(nxPos,
00177                                                             nxVel,
00178                                                                 NxVec3(0.0, 1.0, 0.0),
00179                                                                 nxFor);
00180 
00181     // Now we start the next step, giving a time that will actually be
00182     // in the past by the time we get the results.
00183     m_spPhysXScene->UpdateSources(m_fAccumTime);
00184         m_spCameraController->Update(m_fAccumTime);
00185         m_spPhysXScene->Simulate(m_fAccumTime);
00186     m_fLastSimTime = m_fAccumTime;      
00187 }

00203 void GameApp::Terminate()
00204 {
00205         m_spCameraController = 0;
00206         m_spPhysXScene = 0;
00207         TextManager::Destroy();
00208         GameManager::Destroy();
00209         ResourceManager::Destroy();
00210         InputManager::Destroy();
00211         NiApplication::Terminate();
00212         if (m_pPhysXManager)
00213         m_pPhysXManager->Shutdown();
00214 }
00215 //------------------------------------------------------------------------ 
00221 void GameApp::SetPhysXSDKParams(const NxParameter kParam)
00222 {
00223     if (!m_pPhysXManager)
00224         return;
00225 
00226     m_pPhysXManager->WaitSDKLock();
00227 
00228         NiPhysXSDKDescPtr pSDKDefaults = NiNew NiPhysXSDKDesc;
00229         pSDKDefaults->FromSDK();
00230     pSDKDefaults->SetParameter(NX_VISUALIZE_BODY_AXES, 1.0f);
00231     pSDKDefaults->SetParameter(NX_VISUALIZE_COLLISION_SHAPES, 1.0f);
00232   
00233     if (kParam == NX_PARAMS_NUM_VALUES)
00234     {
00235         pSDKDefaults->ToSDK();
00236     }
00237     else
00238     {
00239         m_pPhysXManager->m_pkPhysXSDK->setParameter(kParam,
00240             pSDKDefaults->GetParameter(kParam));
00241     }
00242      
00243         pSDKDefaults = 0;
00244     m_pPhysXManager->ReleaseSDKLock();
00245         
00246 }
00247 //------------------------------------------------------------------------ 
00254 bool GameApp::CreatePhysXScene()
00255 {
00256     // check for hardware
00257     bool bHaveHardware = m_pPhysXManager->m_pkPhysXSDK->getHWVersion() > 0;
00258       
00259     NxSceneDesc kNxSceneDesc;
00260     kNxSceneDesc.simType = NX_SIMULATION_SW;
00261         NiPoint3 gravity(0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00262     NiPhysXTypes::NiPoint3ToNxVec3(gravity, kNxSceneDesc.gravity);
00263 
00264     if (bHaveHardware)
00265     {
00266                 kNxSceneDesc.simType = NX_SIMULATION_HW;
00267     }
00268       
00269     m_spPhysXScene = NiNew NiPhysXScene();
00270     
00271     m_pPhysXManager->WaitSDKLock();
00272     NxScene* pkNxScene =
00273         m_pPhysXManager->m_pkPhysXSDK->createScene(kNxSceneDesc);
00274     if (!pkNxScene && kNxSceneDesc.simType == NX_SIMULATION_HW)
00275     {
00276         kNxSceneDesc.simType = NX_SIMULATION_SW;
00277         pkNxScene =
00278             m_pPhysXManager->m_pkPhysXSDK->createScene(kNxSceneDesc);
00279         NiMessageBox::DisplayMessage(
00280             "Couldn't create hardware scene. Using Software.\n",
00281             "Scene Failure");
00282         bHaveHardware = false;
00283     }
00284     m_pPhysXManager->ReleaseSDKLock();
00285     
00286     if (!pkNxScene)
00287     {
00288         NiMessageBox::DisplayMessage(
00289             "Unable to create PhysX scene.\n",
00290             "Scene Failure");
00291         return false;
00292     }
00293     
00294     m_spPhysXScene->SetPhysXScene(pkNxScene);
00295             
00296     if (m_spPhysXScene)
00297     {
00298         m_spPhysXScene->SetUpdateDest(true);
00299         m_spPhysXScene->SetUpdateSrc(true);
00300         m_spPhysXScene->UpdateDestinations(0.0f, true);
00301                 m_spPhysXScene->UpdateSources(0.0f, true);
00302     }
00303     
00304     return true;
00305 }
